name: Summer of Football
tagline: 2014 Football Cup for Twitter - World Championship in Brazil - soccer, photos, live commentary and score, results
body:
Summer of Football helps enhance your world championship experience. Get a peek behind the scenes with photos and Tweets posted by the players. During games follow commentary by the best experts and get more insight with statistics. In time between games read about the latest events. Get the best from the millions of Tweets and keep your home timeline uncluttered. Join teams from around the world!


### Gestures and Shortcuts
To scroll to the top of the current category tap its name.
You can close a photo in three ways:
- by tapping,
- by swiping up if photo fits vertically on the screen,
- by pinching-in.


### Actions on a Tweet
After long press you can:
- write a new Tweet,
- post a reply to tweet author,
- favorite a Tweet,
- retweet.
Other actions:
- zoom in a photo,
- open link in the in-app browser (then either add it to a Reading List or open in Safari).

![Tweet action example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mr-w/summer.of.football/master/tweet.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
